name: Casa Refugiados
description: Programa Casa Refugiados is a non-profit that collaborates with the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees  (UNHCR) to promote and protect the rights of asylum seekers. The program highlights their commitment to asylum seekers by emphasizing their support for integration through a frame based on cultural diffusion, respect for human rights, and solidarity. Its mission is to be an active organization with the goal of creating a world with global citizenship, human rights, and respect for the environment.
